column5: Enjoy some fun in the sun right on Lake Buchanan! Come enjoy great bird-watching, fishing, the local winery, small-town antiquing, kayaking, or just relax in this perfect tranquil weekend getaway. Youâ€™ll love staying in this serene waterfront location. Hop in a boat and paddle 15 minutes to the nearby island!  The Hancock Lake Cottage is an ideal spot for downtime and a fun-filled vacation in the hill country.
column8: Hancock Lake Cottage "Mermaid Ave" on the Water!
